scripts.build: concurrently "yarn workspace landing regBuild" "yarn workspace software-eng regBuild" && yarn workspace @nathanld/host regBuild
scripts.preview: concurrently "yarn build-l" "yarn serve-l" "yarn build-se" "yarn serve-se" "yarn build-h" "yarn serve-h" --names "landing,software-eng,host" --prefix "[{name}]" --prefix-colors blue,green,red
